name: VLADIcast
tag_list: video, film, hd, dvd, self-distribution, distribution
overview:
VLADIcast is a provider of Internet-based digital distribution systems. VLADIcast creates and manages white-label private video screening rooms and public video distribution sites for its clients.

VLADIcast’s flagship product is the GoScreening Platform. The GoScreening Platform is comprised of a set of web server and client technologies which allow VLADIcast to create PUBLIC and PRIVATE online video screening rooms. The platform serves as a code-base for high quality, high resolution video sharing applications. Examples of distributed video include not are not limited to: rough cuts, locked picture, short films, feature length films, trailers, and screeners.

VLADIcast’s encoding service prepares video content for online consumption. Videos are distributed as high quality streams, iPod/iPohone compatible downloads, and files that download directly to a DVD-R and play back on any DVD player.
